summary: This report provides our most current data on the unmet need for meal services and home-based care services for older individuals—updating what we previously provided in 2015. We estimated that: Food insecurity among older Americans in 2021 was 18% The percentage of those receiving home-delivered meals increased slightly during this period The percentage of individuals who have trouble with at least one activity of daily...
title: Older Americans Act: Updated Information on Unmet Need for Services
